author: jeremias
msg: Added support for fetching bitmap resolution (only implemented for JFIF-compliant JPEG files for now, all other remain at 72dpi as before)

author: jeremias
msg: Overflow-Handling: Testing what is possible in the AreaTreeRenderer.

author: jeremias
msg: PDFState was cleaned up, simplified and refactored to support a "break-out" mechanism that allows to temporarily break out of the current viewport context.
Support for sending comments to the PDF stream for debugging purposes.
